name: AIRBORNE FACTORY
description:
The 2D platformer game!

The best game you've ever played bro! The main task is clear. Kill all the enemies in the factory and then go to the next part!

Kill all the enemies in the factory!
💎 The game has a total of 2 levels, But in
         the full version there will be
        10 floors and 50 different levels !!!
 🟥 system requirements: 🟥 Procesor - Intel pentium ✔ 🟥 Ram - 500 mb ✔ 🟥 Grafic card - GT 1030 ✔ 🟥 Avalible space - 100mb ✔
